Provider Partnership Script + CRM Workflow

(Prepared by Matthew James Carbonell | Community Engagement Manager Candidate)
Miami, FL • matthewjamescarbonell@gmail.com
matthewjamescarbonell.com • 305‑764‑2999

Purpose

Transform provider outreach from ad‑hoc conversation into a measurable referral system built on empathy, trust, and data discipline.

1️⃣ Sample Call Script — Pediatric / Diagnostic Partner

Approx. 2–3 minutes • Tone: Warm, bilingual‑aware, professional. Goal: understand clinic priorities before presenting Kyo.

Step 1 — Open (Empathy + Relevance)

“Dr. _____, I’m Matthew with Kyo. I know many practices are balancing time and bandwidth while trying to help families get ABA services faster. My goal is to make that hand‑off effortless for your team and reassuring for parents.”

Step 2 — Connect to Mission (Data + Impact)

“On average, our partner clinics see families scheduled within 48 hours of referral, and we send short bilingual status updates so you always know where each family is in the process.”

Step 3 — Invitation to Collaborate

“I’d love to drop off a short bilingual packet and QR card so your staff can refer without PHI—just family consent info. What day this week works best for a 10‑minute walk‑through with your office manager?”

Step 4 — Follow‑Up Commitment

“I’ll email a one‑page summary afterward with our referral turnaround metrics and include my direct cell in case anything comes up.”

Spanish variant (closing line)

“Así su equipo puede ayudar a las familias sin demora y con total tranquilidad.” (So your team can help families promptly and with full peace of mind.)

2️⃣ CRM Workflow — From Contact to Conversion

Thin cyan arrows indicate handoffs; small icons (phone, calendar, form, clipboard, heart) mark action types.
StageAction OwnerSystem Field / MetricSLA (Target)
ContactMatthewProvider Name, Role, LanguageLog within 24 hrs of meeting
Follow‑UpMatthewFollow‑Up Date, Notes from CallCompleted within 2 business days
ReferralProviderReferral Submitted (Y/N), Form Type5 new providers per month
IntakeIntake TeamFirst‑Touch Time (hrs), Intake Date≤ 48 hrs from referral
ConversionBCBA TeamIntake → Treatment Start Ratio≥ 40% within 60 days

3️⃣ Example KPI Snapshot

MetricDefinitionTarget / 60 DaysOwner
New Referring ClinicsProviders who sent ≥1 referral this month5 per monthMatthew Carbonell
Referral Conversion RateReferrals → Intakes Started40% in ≤ 60 daysIntake / Outreach Team
Avg. Response TimeHours from referral → first contact≤ 48 hrsIntake Team
Provider RetentionActive referrers for ≥ 2 months80% retainedMatthew Carbonell

System Tools + Audit Note

  • CRM Platform: Salesforce Health Cloud or HubSpot CRM with custom ABA fields.
  • Weekly Review: Every Friday → dashboard update + outlier analysis.
  • Data Hygiene: All provider contacts tagged by ZIP + Language for territory mapping.
  • Ethical Guardrails: No PHI stored pre‑intake; HIPAA compliant via consent‑based forms.
